title: Premier League set to push to finish season
description: The Premier League is set to reiterate its commitment to completing the season in an emergency board meeting held via conference call on Thursday.

title: EFL releases £50m relief deal to clubs as Trophy final postponed
description: The EFL is to release a £50m relief fund to help clubs with cash-flow issues because of coronavirus, while the Leasing.com Trophy final is postponed.

title: Tennis suspension extended until June as entire clay-court season goes
description: The suspension of the professional tennis tours because of coronavirus is extended to 7 June, ruling out the entire clay-court season.

title: Coronavirus pandemic: Welcome to The Cabin Fever Podcast
description: Fun and frank disability chat to get you through the days of Covid-19.

title: Coronavirus: How the government hopes to stop you touching your face
description: With coronavirus spreading, ministers are looking for new ways to make us behave more hygienically.

title: 'Sunday service' possible every day on railways
description: Rail timetable reductions could take effect in days as train firms deal coronavirus effects.

title: Coronavirus: EastEnders, Casualty, Doctors and Holby City suspend filming
description: Production of BBC dramas Casualty, Doctors and Holby City is also on hold until further notice.

title: Your pictures on the theme of 'reading'
description: Each week, we publish a gallery of readers' pictures on a set theme. This week it is "reading".

title: Coronavirus: Renters to be protected from eviction, PM says
description: The government had been urged to do more for families, workers and tenants affected by coronavirus.

title: Coronavirus: MPs told to stay out of Commons chamber
description: Tories and Labour say only those asking the PM questions should attend, as coronavirus fears continue.

title: USTA 'assessing options' for US Open after French Open switch
description: The United States Tennis Association says it has not ruled out switching the US Open to a later date, after the French Open was moved.

title: Coronavirus: Asian nations face virus battle amid WHO warning
description: The World Health Organization said some needed to "act now" with "aggressive measures".

title: Alex Salmond case: Witness says accuser did not attend Bute House dinner
description: Alex Salmond is accused of attempting to rape a woman after a meal with a celebrity at the first minister's official residence.

title: Glastonbury 2020: Festival cancelled due to coronavirus
description: Taylor Swift, Sir Paul McCartney and Kendrick Lamar had been due to headline the event in June.

title: Sainsbury's and Asda limit sales of all food items
description: Shoppers can only buy three of any particular food item as supermarkets crack down on stockpiling.

title: Coronavirus: Will I get a refund on my ticket if events are cancelled?
description: Music, sports and other events could be called off because of the coronavirus outbreak.

title: Former Cardiff and Aston Villa midfielder Whittingham in hospital
description: Former Cardiff City and Aston Villa midfielder Peter Whittingham is in hospital with head injuries after a fall.

title: Euro 2020 postponed until next summer
description: Euro 2020 is postponed by one year until 2021 because of the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Coronavirus: Tokyo 2020 Olympic organisers respond to frustrated athletes
description: Olympic organisers warn "no solution will be ideal" in preparing for Tokyo 2020 after being accused of putting athletes "in danger".

title: Leicester Tigers: Premiership club 'no longer up for sale'
description: Leicester Tigers are no longer up for sale because of a lack of suitable investors and uncertainty caused by Brexit and coronavirus.

title: Coronavirus: Vanessa Hudgens sorry for 'people are going to die' comments
description: The High School Musical star seemed to question how serious people dying from coronavirus is.

title: Coronavirus: Second-home owners urged to stay away
description: A rural GP says local health services will not be able to cope with a surge in people relocating.

title: New Match of the Day podcast: Top 10 - vote for your greatest Premier League captain
description: Gary Lineker, Alan Shearer and Ian Wright debate who is the greatest Premier League captain - and you can rank your top 10 Premier League captains too.

title: Trailblazer playwright on the need to keep black British history alive
description: Winsome Pinnock highlights British attitudes to the country's involvement in the slave trade.

title: Coronavirus kindness: Brockham flood volunteers join fight
description: A charity set up to tackle floods six years ago is helping people amid the Covid-19 pandemic.

title: Coronavirus: Violinists play Titanic hymn in front of empty toilet paper aisle
description: The violinists say their widely shared performance is about coping and having a laugh in tough times.

title: The Papers: £350bn 'war chest' to save UK economy
description: The front pages react to the chancellor's "unprecedented" package of financial measures.

title: US election 2020: Rampant Biden crushes Sanders in hat-trick
description: As his momentum grows, the former US vice-president appeals directly to Sanders supporters.

title: The English Game: Netflix replays the birth of modern football
description: A period drama from Julian Fellowes recreates the birth of the beautiful game.

title: 'We discuss food banks at school gates like it's normal'
description: Stories of people struggling to eat in Oxford - from a jobless woman with an MA to a funeral director.

title: Single-use plastics ban in Wales unveiled
description: Plastic straws, cotton buds and balloon sticks are among the items set to be outlawed from 2021.

title: 'They were like: This brown kid, this Asian kid, where is he from?'
description: Thousands of Bengali Italians came to the UK hoping for a better future. But which country do they call home?

title: Launching the Hubble Space Telescope: 'Our window into the Universe'
description: How the launch of the Hubble telescope wasn't all plain sailing.

title: Coronavirus: How to help the rural elderly
description: Coronavirus means many elderly people will be isolated in the countryside, far from their families.

title: Coronavirus: How can we stay in virtual touch with older relatives?
description: Older people who may not already have video-calling devices are being told to avoid leaving home.

title: Facial recognition: Artists trying to fool cameras
description: A group of protesters are angry about the use of facial recognition cameras by police in London.

title: The gin maker using his alcohol for hand sanitiser
description: A Bristol gin maker is making emergency supplies of hand sanitiser - giving the proceeds to charity.

title: How do you work out what something is worth?
description: Auctions have been around for centuries, but underpin the success of many internet giants today.

title: JoJo & Gran Gran: 'My grandmother lives on in my stories'
description: New CBeebies series JoJo & Gran Gran is based on the characters from Laura Henry's books inspired by her grandmother.

title: 'It was never my plan to be the boss of a huge company'
description: Why Swiss drugs giant Novartis was prepared to take a chance on a young American.
